title: Unable to access settings on the client
body:
I have run into the problem where the client is too large for my monitor. After looking through other forums, I discovered that I needed to resize the client. Problem is that the settings is not on my screen. I tried moving the client over, but every time I make an attempt, that area of the client disappears. I think this happens because the client is trying to resize itself, but it renders me unable to do anything with my friends list or the settings. Anyone know a solution? I have included a link to a picture of my client. Unfotunately the "add link" option is not working, or I did something wrong, so sorry for no hyperlink.
file:///C:/Users/Winser's%20PC/Pictures/Screenshots/Screenshot%20(1).png

replies.body: Unfortunately, I can't see the picture you tried to link since you just posted the directory rather than a direct image link to an uploaded file. You should be able to resize your client using **CTRL** **+** or **CTRL -** at any time. Give it a go and let me know if it worked for you.
Odd enough the day after I posted this, the league client automatically resized itself, but thanks for the help anyways.
